testcase.name: The Higher Price In The First Page Can't Be Greater Than U$2000
testcase.skipped: Given Open Browser on "www.google.com"......................................passed And Search for "Amazon Brasil" and Search...................................passed And Navigate to "www.amazon.com.br" Through The Search Page.................passed And Search For "Iphone" Using The Search Bar................................passed When Find The The More Expensive "Iphone" In Page...........................passed And Convert Its Value To USD Using "https://exchangeratesapi.io/" API.......pending Then Make Sure The Converted Value Is Not Greater Than US"2000".............skipped
